meanings.definition: The art or practice of incising a design on a hard surface, often a metal plate, by cutting grooves into it.
meanings.sent1: She admired the intricate engravings on the silver bracelet.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a collection of historical engravings from famous artists.
meanings.sent3: The detective found a secret message hidden in the engravings of the ancient sword.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like engravings etched deeply into her heart.
meanings.sent5: The engravings on the tombstone told the story of a life well-lived.

meanings.definition: A print or impression made from an engraved plate, block, or other surface.
meanings.sent1: He purchased a set of engravings to decorate his office walls.
meanings.sent2: The book contained beautiful engravings of mythical creatures.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat left tiny engravings of its paw prints on the freshly painted fence.
meanings.sent4: The music left an emotional engraving on her soul that she would never forget.
meanings.sent5: The engravings on the old coin revealed its age and history.
